channel.title: iDigital

item.title: ‘He ended up homeless and penniless’: My uncle conned my father into signing over their mother’s house. What can I do?
item.description: “His brother went to the prison where my dad was incarcerated and had him sign over the house.”

item.title: Phantom data centers: What they are (or aren’t) and why they’re hampering the true promise of AI
item.description: So-called fake data centers are a bottleneck to scaling infrastructure to keep up with compute demand for AI and other critical workloads.

item.title: How to map OpenAI’s ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode to your iPhone action button
item.description: Mapping ChatGPT Advanced Voice Mode to the new physical Action Button on the side of newer iPhones, just above the volume up and down.

item.title: How Meta’s latest research proves you can use generative AI to understand user intent
item.description: By thinking about recommendation as a generative problem, you can tackle it from new angles and use LLMs to better understand user intent.

item.title: ‘He’s 70 and fairly wealthy’: I met the love of my life three years ago. How do I politely ask that he include me in his will?
item.description: “His two sons are against any kind of commitment between us, as their dad has had two failed marriages.”

item.title: 100% stocks for retirement? A new study says dump the 60/40 portfolio and target-date funds.
item.description: An all-equity portfolio, with a focus on international stocks, could be the key to maximizing retirement wealth, research suggests.
